docs.lead_paragraph: Despite advances in medicine, a longevity gap that has long favored wealthy Americans has more than doubled since the 1970s, researchers say.

docs.lead_paragraph: An energized John Kasich heads into South Carolina's Republican presidential primary hoping to build on a strong showing in New Hampshire, but he's refusing to tailor or shift his message to fit the state's more conservative electorate.

docs.lead_paragraph: Eager to share Bernie Sanders's claim to the grass roots, Hillary Clinton is having trouble owning up to the deep pockets helping her campaign. For his part, Sanders is struggling to make a convincing case that the numbers add up in his hugely expensive health plan.

docs.lead_paragraph: His policies would give several of our systems northern European characteristics, including some that could surprise some of his supporters.
docs.abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column expresses surprise that large portion of America's youthful voters support Sen Bernie Sanders's goal of fundamentally reshaping American capitalism and values to resemble those of Europe; opposes Sanders's plan to centralize power in Washington, raise taxes and Europeanize American public university system, arguing changes would discourage risk-taking, harm students and curtail power to choose one's own lifestyle.
docs.snippet: His policies would give several of our systems northern European characteristics, including some that could surprise some of his supporters.

docs.lead_paragraph: The state, already a test case for the embrace of Obama’s health care law, now stands to become one for attempts to undo it by the current governor.

headline.main: Kentucky Ex-Governor Aims to Halt Rollback of Obamacare Changes
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Ex-Governor Fights Health Care Changes

docs.abstract: Former Kentucky Gov Steven L Beshear, Democrat who expanded health care in state under Affordable Care Act, announces creation of nonprofit group Save Kentucky Healthcare to push back against efforts by Republican Gov Matt Bevin to dismantle state health care exchange Kynect.
docs.snippet: The state, already a test case for the embrace of Obama’s health care law, now stands to become one for attempts to undo it by the current governor.
